project_name: Data Analytics Portfolio - Financial & Customer Intelligence

core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Print Design with SaaS Utility.
Content is King: Data is the hero. Every pixel must serve the metric.
Density with Breath: High information density (for execs) balanced by generous padding (for focus).
Color is Function: 95% Monochrome, 5% Signal Color.
anti_patterns: No Purple/Teal gradients (unless specific data category).
No 'Default Vercel' look - customize the Shadcn radius and shadows.

typography.installation: Import via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@400;500;600;700;800&display=swap');

dashboard_view.rules: Use col-span-2 or col-span-3 for main charts. Use col-span-1 for summary cards.

landing_view.rules: Asymmetrical layout. Hero takes 8 cols. Supporting content takes 4 cols.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: h-10 px-4 py-2 bg-slate-900 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-slate-800 font-medium transition-colors
buttons.ghost: h-10 px-4 py-2 hover:bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 rounded-md transition-colors

charts.style: Clean, minimal grid lines. Tooltips must have bg-white, shadow-lg, border-slate-100.

navigation.sidebar: w-64 bg-slate-50/50 border-r border-slate-200 h-screen sticky top-0
navigation.topbar: h-16 border-b border-slate-200 bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md sticky top-0 z-50

visual_enhancers.gradients: Subtle mesh gradients allowed ONLY in Hero backgrounds (Opacity < 10%). NO gradients on buttons.
visual_enhancers.shadows: shadow-sm for cards, shadow-xl for floating elements (modals, dropdowns).
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid slate-200. Use slate-300 for active states.

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-slate-500 is only used for large text or non-critical labels. Use text-slate-600+ for body.
accessibility.testing: All interactive elements must have data-testid attributes.

images.description: Diverse business team meeting in modern office - Use for 'Business Framing' or 'About' section.
Modern office space with glass partition - Use for Login background or Hero section backdrop.
Team collaborating around a table - Use for 'Team' or 'Process' section.

assets.icons: Use lucide-react (default). For specialized finance icons, use @phosphor-icons/react (install if needed).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME ENFORCEMENT: The user requested a LIGHT theme. Do not use dark mode by default. Ensure index.css :root variables are optimized for a clean, white/slate palette.
2. COMPONENT CUSTOMIZATION: Do not use the default Shadcn 'radius-md' blindly. For this 'Enterprise' look, use slightly sharper corners (rounded-md or rounded-sm) for a more professional feel.
3. DATA DENSITY: In the Dashboard views, pack information densely but use whitespace (padding) inside the cards to prevent clutter. Follow the 'Bento Mode B' grid rules.
4. BUSINESS FRAMING: The 'Business Framing' phase is text-heavy. Use typography hierarchy (Manrope Bold vs Inter Regular) to make it readable. Do not just dump text blocks.
5. PDF EXPORT: Ensure the layout for the 'Executive Memo' is print-friendly (white background, high contrast, no scrollbars).
6. AI INTEGRATION: When displaying AI insights, use a distinct visual container (e.g., a card with a subtle 'magic' gradient border or icon) to differentiate it from raw data.

universal_guidelines.avoid_ai_slop: Do not use generic centered layouts. Create depth with z-index and shadows.
universal_guidelines.micro_interactions: Every button and card must have a hover state.
universal_guidelines.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
